statements: DELETE FROM account_activity WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM account_activity WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND transaction_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM account_activity WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal' AND transaction_amount < 1000 AND activity_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 101 AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reason = 'Fraudulent Activity' AND amount < 500.00;
